content: note the photo on yarnspirations does not show the correct finished pattern *the classic granny square dishcloth is a fun and easy project yarnspirations * skill level easy materials lily® sugar n cream® solids 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds ombres 56 7 g/2 oz 86 m/95 yds main color mc 1 ball contrast a 1 ball 6 00 mm crochet hook u s j or 10 finished in 11 rounds french version is included in the english pdf file modified september 17 2002 granny square dishcloth / lavette à carreaux 1 see also smaller version by bernat design studio 2 *ed note the current yarnspirations photo shows the 6-round bernat version * 1 https //s3 amazonaws com/com yarnspirations pattern-pdfs/lily_sugarncream012_cr_dishcloth en_us pdf 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/two-tone-dishcloth
